To join our partnership program you just need:

To recruit new clients with the referral link - the user registered from your link is permanently assigned to you and from all his payments you will be paid a percentage;
Distribute a coupon for a discount - the user who used your coupon receives a 5% discount on the purchase and assigned to you and from all his payments you will be paid a percentage.

Partnership bonus can be used for payments of our services or you can withdraw it by WebMoney, QIWI or Payeer.
